name: @cumulus/files-to-granules
description: Converts array-of-files input into a granules object by extracting granuleId from filename

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run generate-task-schemas && cp -R schemas dist/ && ../../node_modules/.bin/webpack
scripts.package: npm run build && (cd dist && node ../../../bin/zip.js lambda.zip index.js schemas)
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R schemas dist/ && ../../node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress -w

author: Cumulus Authors
